scenes.background: Bob and Monica are still discussing the urgency of tasks.
scenes.description: What if we had a list of examples for urgent and non-urgent tasks?

options.text: That's a good idea. It would help us all be on the same page.
options.analysis: You support Bob's idea and emphasize teamwork, showing good perception and social skills, but could improve on self-regulation.

options.text: I'm not sure a list will cover everything, but it's worth trying.
options.analysis: You express some doubt but are willing to give it a shot, demonstrating good self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Lists might help, but let's not make it too rigid.
options.analysis: You caution against rigidity while acknowledging the idea, showing good social skills but lower perception and empathy.
